dmca.title: DMCA_Notification - www.camsads.com/performers/thailandnana_net/index.html
dmca.body:
_____  

From: Accounting Department [mailto:accounting@reliablehosting.com] 
Sent: Monday, March 20, 2006 12:36 PM
To: legal-response@theplanet.com
Cc: dora_pry@yahoo.com
Subject: DMCA_Notification -
www.camsads.com/performers/thailandnana_net/index.html
Importance: High



  NOTICE of COPYRIGHT-TRADEMARK, or RIGHT of PUBLICITY INFRINGEMENT

 

   dora pry (dora_pry@yahoo.com)

   +855.16854858

   Fax: +1.5555555555

   phnom penh, cambodia

   phnom penh, PH 855-23

   KH

 

Dear George Poletes,

 

  the Complainant has requested both in writing and via email to remove this
account

but you have yet to comply. We are requesting the images as well as all
information

regarding this account be deleted and/or removed immediately. We have a good
faith

belief that use of the material in the manner complained of is not
authorized by the

copyright owner, its agent, or the law. Continued abuse will be directed to
RCMP

Computer Crime Division.

 

Declaration:

 

I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am an

agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain intellectual
property

rights, said exclusive owners being named:

 

Phil Michael Blancett,

11110 W Oakland Park Blvd, #379

Sunrise, FL. 33351

 

ACPA applies equally to foreign nationals, and extends to foreign websites
with sufficient contacts to the U.S.

 

September 2000, (UNCITRAL) United NationsCommission on International Trade
Law.

 

http://www.uncitral.org/english/sessions/wg_ec/wp-84.pdf  

 

 

 

Date:  March 20, 2006

 

To:

ISP: Planet.com

The Planet

1333 Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110

Dallas, TX 75207

George Poletes

214-782-7800

217-782-7898

////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

 

 

Infringing URLs:

 

www.camsads.com/performers/thailandnana_net/index.html

 

Pursuant to the Digital Millennium Copyright Act  and the WIPO (World
Intellectual Property Organization) (<"
<http://lcweb.loc.gov/copyright/legislation/dmca.pdf>
>http://lcweb.loc.gov/copyright/legislation/dmca.pdf>;), this letter
serves as actual notice of infringement in the event of legal proceedings.

 

I may be contacted at:

Sean Fonte

DMCA/Abuse Department

11110 W Oakland Park Blvd, #379

Sunrise, FL. 33351

(305) 318-5855 - Cell

(866) 889-3661 - Fax

seanf@reliablehosting.com
